sentences.en: And again in November.
sentences.cn: 在十一月又一次。

sentences.en: Autumn will be king September , October and November .
sentences.cn: 秋天将会是九月，十月和十一月之王。

sentences.en: Beyond the windows, a November midday was uniformly grey.
sentences.cn: 往窗外望去，11月的中午始终都是灰蒙蒙的。

sentences.en: By November, after all, it will be more than a year since the global crisis began in the US, and Obama and his team must show tangible prospects for recovery.
sentences.cn: 毕竟，到了十一月时，自全球性金融危机在美国爆发以来，已经过去一年多了。 奥巴马和他的团队必须展现出经济复苏的切实前景。

sentences.en: Demand picked up and a reprint was required last November.
sentences.cn: 由于需求量上升，去年11月，再版已是势在必行。

sentences.en: Elections will now take place on November the twenty-fifth.
sentences.cn: 选举现定于11月25号举行。

sentences.en: For me, Christmas always began in the middle of the cold, windy month of November.
sentences.cn: 在我的记忆中，圣诞节总是从寒冷多风的十一月中旬就开始了。

sentences.en: He arrived in London in November 1939.
sentences.cn: 他于1939年11月抵达伦敦。

sentences.en: He expects the elections to be held around November.
sentences.cn: 他预计选举在11月左右举行。

sentences.en: He only got a plurality on November 3rd, just 49 percent.
sentences.cn: 他在11月3号的选举中仅获得了49%的相对多数票。

sentences.en: He was bailed to appear before local magistrates on 5 November.
sentences.cn: 他获得保释，将于11月5日在地方法庭出庭受审。

sentences.en: House prices are rising for the first time since November.
sentences.cn: 房价自11月以来首次上涨。

sentences.en: In November 1941 Payne was seriously ill with pneumonia.
sentences.cn: 1941年11月，佩恩得了严重的肺炎。

sentences.en: In November, Clean's bakery produced 50 percent more bread than normal.
sentences.cn: 克林面包房11月份烤的面包比平常多50％。

sentences.en: It was now the middle of November, cold and often foggy.
sentences.cn: 现在是11月中旬，天气寒冷而且经常有雾。

sentences.en: Last November the commission gave its stamp of approval to the deal.
sentences.cn: 去年11月，委员会核准了这宗交易。

sentences.en: The problems began last November.
sentences.cn: 问题在去年11月份开始出现。

sentences.en: The US trade deficit widened to $7.59 billion in November.
sentences.cn: 11月美国的贸易赤字扩大到75.9亿美元。

sentences.en: Too much snow in November.
sentences.cn: 太多的大雪在十一月。

sentences.en: Troops were sent to the islands to restore order last November.
sentences.cn: 去年11月，军队被派往这些岛屿以恢复秩序。

trans.tran_en: the 11th month of the year, between October and December
the 11th month of the year, between October and December
